cyclone.name: HERMINE
cyclone.current_location: about 60 mi (100 km) south of Key West, Florida
cyclone.trajectory: Moving west across the Florida Straits into the eastern Gulf of Mexico, forecast to slow and turn WNW–NW Monday–Tuesday, then curve northeastward toward Florida’s Big Bend and the Southeast U.S. coast late Wednesday–Friday
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: Florida Big Bend / north-central Gulf Coast

weather_observation.impacted_coast: Gulf Coast of Florida, then Georgia–South Carolina–North Carolina coasts
weather_observation.wind: No tropical-storm-force winds expected; conditions remain below gale force
